listRA.name: Basic Web Application
listRA.description:
This is a simple description of a monolithic Web Application. 
- A simple Single Page Application as a Client
- A server Application
- An auth server
- A relational DB
- A logging system to store all the activities in the app
- A external Service for handling the payment

listRA.name: Security System
listRA.description:
Simple security system for motion detection. The system is based on arduino microcontroller.
It has a motion sensor and a camera sensor to detect motion and proximity. Once the signal is detected, the microcontroller activates the speaker actuator for a period of 3 minutes. After that it send a notification to the users using a notification service via http Api Call.

listRA.name: Basic To-Do App
listRA.description: Basic Todo App for MVC architectures

listSA.name: Microservice Web App
listSA.description:
Basic Microservice web Application with payment, logging and authentication, product and stock isolated services. This architecture implement the Reference Architecture " Basic Web App".

Components:
    -Web App: Fronted Application
    -Client App: Mobile Application
    - ApiGateway: Its the main Actor for forwarding the incoming request to the subsequent service based on the url.
    -Logging-Service:
